values: so, i'm pretty much set for life. i love matt more than anything or any one in the entire world. him and my family are at the top of my list. Well, i really don't have anything to say but i'm going to marry him and we are going to live happily ever after as long as we both live. I love him, he is the only one for me  i know it. i love him i love him forever.

i miss matt so much and i love him and i can't wait to see him
my aunt says there will be a lot of hott boys at sun river but i really don't care, i miss matt and wherever he is, is where i want to be. i love him and if you're reading this matt,


I love you so much and you know that, i'm so sad that i haven't talked to you today. I love you so much. I can't wait for our future. I know it's going to be a dream come true for both of us. You and me for the rest of our lives. I can't wait. I hope you read this and i want you to know that no matter how many "hott" guys are in sun river, you don't have to worry, and i know you know that. You trust me and i'm so glad. I love you and our relationship couldn't be more perfect. I love you I love you I love you I love you for always and forever, for the rest of my life.

Matt and I are back together. My life has a purpose again. I can't believe how happy I am. We both are so happy and i can't believe how long it's been since i've been to this site. anyway i love him.....so much. life is good, no great. and school starts in a few days and every thing is wonderful. Thank you God for bringing him back to me. 

a peaceful sorrow at home is the best i'll ever be able to offer the world, in the end and so i told my desolation angels goodbye, a new life for me.
-jack kerouac

I thought that you cared about me
that you would never leave my side
i believed in my trust for you
as well as my strength and my pride

Yet for you it was so easy
to throw all of this away
When i leaned for you to comfort me
you had nothing left to say

So i lie here in my bed at night
all i can do is cry
I try so hard to forget you
but my heart, I can't deny

Becaues i will always love you
and wish that you were here
Since now i am without you
and that is my worst fear

I just wanted to let you know 
as i wipe the tears from my face
i miss the way you made me laugh
your smile and warm embrace

And to tell you that your happiness 
is all i want to see
Even if your happiness
means being without me.

So i'll end this poem now
as i try hard not to cry
and with these final words i'll say
I love you and goodbye.

-Erica Johnsen
i met a really hot boy. his name is derick and he's andys friend. ummmmm.....i don't really have anything else to say right now but kaitie wanted me to post something so this is for you, kaitie

an empty promise
an empty threat
an empty word you couldn't forget
your heart constricting with so much pain
a world of losses 
a world of gains
the devil speaking to your soul
never, not once, ever feeling control
a thousand tears, a thousand lies
a thousand deaths, a million cries
spinning around just like a top
never catching your breath, never able to stop
put the key in the lock and turn it fast
engulfed in the future caught up in the past
you're blind for all you can see is black
spinning in the darkness feeling the attack
of anguish and hurt coursing through your veins
all cuts run deep and the pain will never change


found:
i bleed my own blood
after slitting my own wrist
lost without love, trapt, forever hopeless.


A shadow lies across a distant time
where there was love and understanding
two people were brought together
one weaker than the other
conformed to their ruling
while losing old images, and creating new ones
a new person was born
only a few could see....
what neither of the two did at the time
then voices on the wind spoke
and eyes were opened
and hearts were crushed
storms raged in two persons minds
'til one day when the minds came again into one
but something had changed
once weaker before
that person was guarded
by their own cautiousness
walls had been set and made with great care
the one of ruling before
now felt unwanted and unclean
oh how those walls created problems for us all
unknowing of how to fix things
both hold back
the truest things of their minds
where once before
both walked with ease and understanding
now walk blind and frightened
this storm has settled on these poor persons minds
has seemed to have settled in
for a long time yet to come
both of these persons are fighting 
each other 
for something
neither of them can have
tears shed from countless battles
could fill and ocean
tears shed for both
and themselves
tears of hopes and wished
for a day when things were like 
once before.
~becca clark

Broken Promise Ring 

I really wanna call you, but I know that it's not right.
I probably shouldn't tell you but I dreamed of you last night.
I guess I'm not prepared to say...
Goodbye, so long, farewell, I won't be seeing you again
Until next time that he goes away.

You told me that you loved me, I started tearing down those walls.
I really started to trust you but you set me up to take the fall.
I guess I'm not prepared to say...
Goodbye, so long, farewell, I won't be seeing you again
Until next time that he goes away.

I guess that I'm wrong for falling in love,
But you're still the one that I'm dreaming of.
I guess that it's you I want to hold onto,
But you're holding onto someone else. 

i don't know how you feel about me
i don't know where you seem to be
i don't know if you have a girlfriend back home
i don't know if right now you alone
i don't know why i think about you so much
i don't know why its you i want to touch
i don't know if you forgot all about that week
i don't know if when i called you didn't want to speak
i don't know when i'm going to see you again
i don't know if you think about me now and then
i don't realize why our phone conversations got so small
i don't undersand why you put up a huge wall
the only thing i do know is, i fell in love with you
and if you don't know anything either, know that because it's true

things happen for reasons not understood
i want to see you
i wish there was a way i could
please tell me that we'll someday meet again
without your friendship my summer would not be what it's been
we're miles apart and i know you don't care
although i really yearn to be sitting there
right next to you, like it used to be
even though it was just a short while
you made me so happy
the pain i felt was extremely deep and true
but somehow i forgot it all when i was with you
too bad my vacation had to come to an end
because now i feel like i've lost a friend
my feeling for you will not go away
and i seriously doubt that i'll be okay
because i know you don't feel the same
after a few weeks you won't even remember my name
every first star in the sky at night that i see
i make a wish that you'll fall in love with me
although sadly wishing is all that i can do
it's just too bad because i know they'll never come true

betrayer has become your new name
our friendship will never again be the same
you lied to me every way you could 
i won't forgive you don't think i should
so many hours i spent thinking of our future and past
plans i had for us got broken so fast
it was all your fault i won't take any of the blame
because of what you did i'll never be the same
you hurt me and left with so much pain
you made me feel like i had nothing to gain
don't think i'm going to keep the promises i made to you
because you never kept my sectrets, you were so untrue
i thought you cared i guess i was wrong
i can't believe you lied for so long
you don't have to worry about me ever again
because we are no longer friends
i'm so sick of you only pretending to care
because when i really need you, you're never there

So you think you can walk all over her and treat her like a doll? She has feeling and when you're done with her you can't just put her on a shelf for a later day. She thought she ment something to you, I guess she was wrong but it doesn't matter because she's done with you and now she's gone. You'll never find another like her and it's up to you whether you want to be a part of her life or not. Don't go looking for things you already have and don't pretend to feel sorry for the hurt you cause; don't be sad. Even though it might suck, life has to go on and whether or not you chose to be part of her life is your decision. From your point of view she understands why you did what you did but to her it was so selfish. She knows that you weren't willing to waste your time on her so now she needs to ecxept that her time will be better wasted on someone else. Someone who cares and who knows what they want because it seems to her that when you think you want something it slips away and you let it die. and then that wonderfully beautiful person that you tormented and played with like a doll is tossed aside. Rejected and confused with the short, unfilling answers she recieves. She thinks about you, the good and the bad, and now the bad takes over because she can truly see how you made her become tomorrows trash.

"A0001"

We'll all look the same someday 
And even now the robot starts to think 
I wonder what it dreams


"Concealer"

With fists raised high in tightened knots 
The room explodes and now this blood is on your hands 
And there is no time for a second chance 
To paint my face with blood and tears and cover up 
In an open book that no one reads 
A misspelled word that no one knows 
You stole the rain 
Then you turned around and tore my life in two 
Just like the picture that once hung on the wall in the room that we used to share 
So fold me up and put me back in the place where you used to keep your heart 

You think its getting smaller? 
It's been that way for quite some time now 

The cadence beats down on the tar 
It sounds the same as your fists raining down 
(if you wanted to change the way I look at you...) 
We've got to leave before the sun sets 
Or maybe we don't have time(time to waste.) 
It won't be long until you're gone into the night 
You won't have time to paint my face with cover-up


"Autobiography Of A Nation"

Write these words back down inside 
We have burned their villages and all the people in them died 
We adopt their customs and everything they say we steal 
All the dreams they had we kill 
Still we all sleep sound tonight 
Is this what you wanted to hear? 
We erased all their images and dance 
And replaced them with borders and flags 

At the top of this timeline you'll remember 
This is the lipstick on the collar 
And in my own life I've seen it in the mirror 
sometimes at the cost of others hopes 

So write these words back down inside 
That's where you need it the most 
and without conviction of heart you will never feel it at all 
Yeah, we all dance to the same beat when we we're marching 
Yeah, the TV tells us everythign we need to know 
And this scene is painting in all the fashions of the moment 
And history is all the same 

Everything you say you stole 
Every dream you dream you bought


"A Hole In The World"

In this blackout inertia will hold our thoughts 
And the exit sign offers no light to see by 
Can we cast our shadows alone in the dark? 
I can't see without you 

When the world comes crashing down 
Part with it 
Start again 
When the world comes crashing down 
These notes will fold themselves 
Standing at the margin's edge to see where the daybreak ends 
You can find compassion here 
But the page turns too fast 

We fell in this hole that opened up 
Giving up on hope 
Living without love 
And we still type black lines 
When the world comes crashing down 
These notes will fold themselves 

Adjust the aperture to focus on the negative 
Like phosphors in the darkroom ignite 
Like dodging faces in the corner of the print 
Frame by frame this hole is opening and we fall in 

There is no such thing as whole 
There is a hole in the world

"Cross Out The Eyes"

Let's call this the quiet city: 
Where screams are felt as a wave of stoplights 
Drive through the the streets as gunshots punctuate the night 
The sides we take divide us from our faith 
And the mourning dove gets caught in the telephone wire 

Asleep you set the fire in your own house 
And the night was a knife that cut 
And I'm paralyzed 

Cross out the eyes 
Blur all the lines 
Tearing this canvas from the wall 
We crossed out the eyes 
Put lines through these cries 
We pulled all the leaves from the trees that fall 

A silent dance that we did into this hospital bed 
Hear voices from another room 
"It happens all the time" 
But July in the sand 
Then the leaves that fall 
And counting down our days to live.... 
Drain the blood from this valentine. 

"We can rise on the wings of the dove 
See blue skies getting caught in the trail of all this smoke 
We can rise like candles in the dark your always" 
and an envelope marked with your new address 

It was the first time face to face 
I'm crossing the line 
Talking to the other side of death 
Hearing the words that choke memories into flatlines 
I'm calling your name, I'm hoping for something to wash these dreams of you away 

Our fence was blown down in a winter storm and this field 
stretched out of this world into the sound of a trace of blood in a love song 
What can we do to put a stop to the coming white days? 
I'm hoping for something to wash these dreams of you away.


"Paris In Flames"

Now its time to wrap our fears in the night 
And on the first day we'll dress this city in flames 
After all the things you say 
You hate me for being this way 

Still you won't let go of old ideals 
There is no headline to read at night 
When the record slips and you're not holding the needle 

We all sing the songs of separation 
And we watch our lives bleed out through our hands 
Thats how it was on the first day 
We saw Paris in Flames 

I think it's going to rain, rain down 

Here in this collapsed lung of a borough 
There is no sunlight 
The sunlight is manufactured in a windowless room 
Distant and incoherent 
Businessmen hang themselves 

The lower cast side is a jukebox playing the deadman's crescendo 
The needle is a vector 
An intersection that well all must cross 
A dimly lit hallway where shadows of moths decorate the walls 
Discard this message 
Burn this city down 

Discard this message 
Throw this bottle back in the ocean 
Rip this page from the history books 
Smash all the street signs 
Erase all the maps 
Forget my name 
Forget my face 
Because it's going to rain 
And it never ends


"I Am The Killer"

Tuesday wakes up silent 
And there aren't enough pills to sleep 
And then it cuts out like miswired shortwave radio 
It's over 
But nothing can change to ever make it right 
When you live in a nightmare 
It's written all over your face. 

And in a short time 
You're never the same again 
The distance is streamlined 
Between decision and defense: 

Distorient the senses 
Loss of identity 
No one to trust 

Life runs through this trade 
I am no killer 
But I still hide my face 
In the coming days 

I wake up every morning 
From the same dream 
And then I kill it 
But you can't change the letters when the ink dries 

I woke up on the sidewalk and everything just changed 
Now the lights are blinking but I can't see anything 

Everything is falling apart: 
Crumpled paper 
Crushed tin cans 
Broken bottles 
Paper scraps 
We all look the same 
We all look the same 
But I am the killer


"Standing On The Edge Of Summer"

In this room I'm sitting by your side. 
It rains for hours and the phone is off its hook. 
Standing on the edge, casting lots to set me up before you knock me down, 
off the summer's edge and drown me. 
We're betting on our own lives, making up for all the time we lost.
In this house of cards we're all holding hearts and spades
(one breath, one step could knock it all down) 
but you lead with your eyes and you give it away 
(decide, design to cut from the clouds). 
When the people you love get lost in the shuffle, 
(when you leave, you leave nothing but broken hearts)
you let it go and then you fold. 
So we stay on the open road. 
We drive for hours and still no end in sight at all. 
Driving in your car, miss the stop sign, fall in love, just to get knocked out. 
Pull your punches and burn with your cigarettes. 
Pulled like a punch and burnt like a cigarette?
forever.

"Wind Up"

Just ahead I see you winding up 
And you're dressing this color on the edge of fire 
Until these tightened strides 
They march in time again 
I don't know if I will cut through 

I don't know if my heart will beat without you guiding it 

Winding up 
Leading me 
Winding up to explode 

It's the sound of your racing heart 
That beats in time with every start 
(the start of the year. the start of life. the start of war) 
That reaches up and across the sky 
That makes us want to try 

I'm falling to peices 
I can't let go 
Tearing apart your lies 
I want to live 

It's the sound of your shotgun pulse 
Beating over and over in your silent halls 
It's a thought that keeps us alive 
It makes us want to rise 

A scream to guide me through my life 
Winding up 
Leading me 
Winding up to what you can not unwind 

This side of you and if it's taken away 
You won't know what to do 
You're stretching to meet expectations that you will never reach 

And now it's far to late to ever leave this cold 

I'm giving up 
Marching in time with your drums 
I'm letting go of everything i once loved


"How Long Is The Night"

If we run far away do you think we will ever die? 
We'll throw these books in the fire 
Can you stop the train 
Cause it some delay? 
The change machine lied 
And it's too late to scream 

How long is the night? 
It's never over 
The ribbon was tied 
But the card was never read 
The ribbon was crimson 
The color of the night 

Can you see the handwriting on the walls 
And on the autumn leaves that fall 
"What are we gonna do?" 
The trees are giving up on us 
The needle and the thread 
Won't stitch us to the branch 
And the night never ends 

I will never sleep again 
(I will never even close my eyes) 

If the sun is on its way 
Then we will never die 
And we'll follow these tracks to the sight 
Now the lungs collapse 
And the air is getting thin 
All breath expired 
Is too late to heal? 

How long is the night? 

It's all I ever see anymore 
But the day was so bright in the pictures 
In the photo album that you gave me 
It's all I have to live for 

I'm falling down 
And you're not here to break my fall 
I shut my eyes when you're around 
I hold my breath to kill the sound of your voice 
I'm falling down. 
And you're not here to break my fall

"!1100"

We'll all look the same someday 
And even now the robot starts to think 
I wonder what it dreams 
The Tide is high on Fourtheeth Street 
The rain comes in to clear the heat 
The way in is the same way out 
the way up is the same way down 
Now there is no safe way down

my life sucks right now. i want to die. i want to leave everything and everybody behind and start over. i'm sick of my family and i'm sick of my friends. well, not all of my friends but the ones that matter most to me are making the most stupid decisions and i want to shoot them all before they ruin their lives and come crawling to me to fix it all. i won't do that. i hate summer. i hate it. matt is a stupid man whore now who says hes done with relationships and so he goes bed hopping. he's so blind! he says you only live once which is true but you shouldn't go from one girl to another because you don't want a relationship. stop running away and face the thing that you don't want because in the end you'll be a better person because of it. but he doesn't understand that. i want to shoot him. and then theirs becca and joel. my two best friends in the whole world, or at least i thought so. they got back together over canada. joel told me he would NEVER NEVER NEVER EVER go out with her again. but of course.....and becca he fooled her once, shame on him. but he's gunna fool her twice and then it's gunna be shame on her and they both need to grow up because they've said bad things about eachother behind eachothers backs and oh my GOD i want to kill them! if you do the same experiment two times in a row the same thing will happen. what about when they break up? because they will. nobody's ever been in a relationship at this age where you don't break up. it'll happen some time and when it does i'll have to hear all about it from both of them which i'm NOT willing to do. i really really want to kill them. there really are no words to describe how mad at both of them i am. and then theres ben who just doesn't act or sound like he cares anymore so theres nothing i can do about that. i wish i lived a different life. i'm so sick of everything. all the drama. i want to be done with it all. i want to find someone who will love me the same way i love him and whoes someone i can trust and be best friends with and who won't cause me any kind of pain because thats all these people do for me is cause everlasting pain.  and i'm so tired of having to look out for them and so drained for caring about thier problems. i can't do it anymore and i just want to be dead so i don't have to care anymore because i do and it hurts and its driving me crazy. i don't know what to do anymore. i'll just have to see how everythings doing when i get back. i'm done with this vacation. it's not worth it anymore. they're not worth it. i can't stand it anymore and i want it to be over. i want my life to be over. i'm done with everything and everyone.

i'm in la right now. ummm..yep. it's a lot of fun? i don't know. disneyland was okay, i was ready to leave after one day and lucky me we have a 3 day pass! joy to the world. but yeah there are some hotties at my hotel. but i promised ben that i wouldn't do anything and i won't because that's stupid i wouldn't even know them and that's stupid. so i hope he's being good. i don't know if i should trust him in that area of life or not. you know, him and katie....that was a mistake on his part. so i think i'm gunna go to bed now so my parents don't get to worried about me because they will because they're like that and if you're reading this ben, i really like you so don't do anything! you promised and i would be sad. tommorrow i'm gunna spend the day in the pool. the whole day.
a peaceful sorrow is the best i'll ever be able to offer the world. in the end and so i told my desolation angels goodbye. a new life for me.

i dyed my hair. its really really red, i think. so, ben never came to school yesterday, and from what i'm hearing today he didn't go to the show last night either. but i wouldn't know because i wasn't there. hummmmm.......well, i skipped science today. wow great fun. nothing's going on in that class anyway. i can't stand it, and her, ms standifer. we're not doing anything important. why does ben have to be so fucking lazy? so, katie was at the show last night and ana tells me that everybody loves her because she's so cute and small and has short pink hair and she's sooooo hot and she knows everybody and everybody knows her. you know what i have to say about that? FUCK KATIE! well, i shouldn't say that because she could be a really nice little slut. who knows? but i was thinking about stevie yesterday and the picture i have of him by my bed and everything that happened between us. he was and is so fake. i cant stand it. so it's 11 am and i've been at school for 3 and a half hours and we had to give a speech in health but my group, sunnie, ana and i had no idea what we were supposed to do because every body had these big posters and all we had was a black and white picture that we printed out 5 minutes before class started. Matt wrote me this email about how i remind him of carrissa. i really don't care anymore if he wants to be pissed at me for scratching his cd go ahead. i wonder if rene's here today. hummmmm.....oh yeah and he thinks he's so fucking mature but when he talks bad about people and says shit about people behind their backs is that really being as mature as he says he is? me and matt have been having some real troubles lately. oh it's so much fun. i can't imagine my life without him and i know in my heart that he's the one for me, but i don't think that he loves me anymore. he doesn't want to spend time with me at school because we should have our own lives. that's what he said to me. i can't believe it. I really need someone right now to be there for me and i have no one. no one at all. i feel so alone and can't believe that matt can be such a hipocrite. one time he got mad at me because i didn't want him to come over and he told me that we should take every chance we can to see eachother. so i said okay and we have only been apart when we really have to be. until friday when he gave me a whole speach about how we're only 15 and how we need to have a life and not spend as much time together. and then he said that he was doing this in the best interest of both of us and that if i thought that this was a slow way to break up (which i do) then i was stupid because he still loves me and he's not gunna cheat on me or break up with me or anything. Yeah right matt, bull shit! his mom realized that something was different with him too and she's talking about family, i'm talking about me. because i need to be selfish now because he's been selfish in our whole realationship, 6 and a half months down the drain. well, not yet but close. i really hope not becauce as much as i'm in love with him, i am so confused about everything i can't even stand it. Easter, wow what happy day, not. I'm at my aunts house right now and all i want to do is go home and wait for the time to go by. I think I've taken just about every quiz on quizilla, that's how bored i am. plus, nothing but matt crosses my mind every 1.9 seconds. my life is pointless right now, and i worried about some of my grades, and there is nothing for me to do but wait, wait, for tonight, wait for tommorrow, wait for matt, who sadly might never come. He feels like a dream, not real. non existant. I don't know how you spell that. But if my heart is anything like what i think it is, all will be well. It's just been so long and I don't feel like anything's going to get better. I just have to wait.
